titles.title: A bill to establish the Mississippi River National Park in the State of Mississippi.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 6/10/1988--Introduced. Establishes the Mississippi River National Park in Mississippi. Provides for the administration of the Park. Establishes the Mississippi River National Park Advisory Commission. Authorizes appropriations.
